Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, ServerInformation

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, ServerInformation
    Board is used on the client side to start game play and to start chat communication
    Author:
    Nicholas Joerger, Tim Chisholm, Shane Rand, Hassan Robinson
